2.3.2.name: wordpress/image2post
2.3.2.description: This is just an update so thinks will work with the new version of Wordpress 2.0.1. It has not been tested on any other version. If you are updating from version 1.0 of this plugin, then just activate it and load your home page 2 times. You need to be logged in as admin to do this. See readme.txt for a full description.
